item.title: Project 0: Template & Misc
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEZ1Hj5yQ-8&ab_channel=KenJee Open Folder /120-Andy_Portfolio_src conda activate YTstreamlit cd /23-Data Scientist/340-Data_Professor/120-Andy_Portfolio_src hugo server http://localhost:1313/Andy_Portfolio/ ctrl + c to stop hugo server hugo -D to generate html from markdown files cp /public to /Andy_Portfolio Close Folder /120-Andy_Portfolio_src Open Folder /Andy_Portfolio Git commit /Andy_Portfolio https://unsplash.com/ https://pixabay.com/ https://themes.gohugo.io/ I also recommend checking out the Data Professor’s YouTube Channel. He has great tutorials and an awesome virtual internship series: / @dataprofessor A data science portfolio website can greatly help your career opportunities.

item.title: Project 2: Segmenting the Connecticut Wholesale Liquor Market
